name: hulk
content:
hulk noun [C]
(SHIP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the body of an old ship, car, or very large piece of equipment that is broken and no longer used: Here and there the rusted hulk of an abandoned car dots the landscape.

hulk noun [C]
(AWKWARD)
a large, heavy, awkward person or thing: Henry's a real hulk of a man. The Incredible Hulk is a character in a comic who turns from a scientist into a two-metre tall monster.

hulk noun [C]
(BROKEN THING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the body of an old ship, car, or large piece of equipment, which is broken and no longer used: The rusted hulk of an abandoned car sat at the side of the road.
hulk noun [C]
(LARGE PERSON)
a large, heavy person or thing: He was a huge hulk of a man, about six and a half feet tall.
